segment.source: DISM - Deployment Image Servicing and Management
segment.target: DISM - Deployment Image Servicing and Management

segment.source: DISM - Deployment Image Servicing and Management
segment.target: DISM - Deployment Image Servicing and Management

segment.source: DISM - Deployment Image Servicing and Management
segment.target: DISM - Deployment Image Servicing and Management

segment.source: Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) is a command-line tool that is used to mount and service Windows images before deployment.
segment.target: Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) is a command-line tool that is used to mount and service Windows images before deployment.

segment.source: You can use DISM image management commands to mount and get information about Windows image (.wim) files or virtual hard disks (VHD).
segment.target: You can use DISM image management commands to mount and get information about Windows image (.wim) files or virtual hard disks (VHD).

segment.source: You can also use DISM to capture, split, and otherwise manage .wim files.
segment.target: You can also use DISM to capture, split, and otherwise manage .wim files.

segment.source: You can use DISM to install, uninstall, configure, and update Windows features, packages, drivers, and international settings in a .wim file or VHD using the DISM servicing commands.
segment.target: You can use DISM to install, uninstall, configure, and update Windows features, packages, drivers, and international settings in a .wim file or VHD using the DISM servicing commands.

segment.source: DISM commands are used on offline images, but subsets of the DISM commands are also available for servicing a running operating system.
segment.target: DISM commands are used on offline images, but subsets of the DISM commands are also available for servicing a running operating system.

segment.source: DISM is installed with Windows, and it is also distributed in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK).
segment.target: DISM is installed with Windows, and it is also distributed in the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (Windows ADK).

segment.source: DISM replaces several deployment tools, including PEimg, Intlcfg, ImageX, and Package Manager.
segment.target: DISM replaces several deployment tools, including PEimg, Intlcfg, ImageX, and Package Manager.
